name: Barley, Corn And Lobster Salad
keywords: barley, corn, lobster, dairy-free, low-fat, nut-free, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 ears corn, cooked and kernels cut off cob
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the lobsters until they turn bright red, about 10 minutes. Set aside until cool enough to handle. Remove the meat and cut into large chunks.
Toss the lobster, barley and corn together. Add the lemon juice, olive oil, basil, salt and pepper. Toss until well combined. Divide among 4 plates and serve.
